biotools.summary:
A containerized web server for the identification and topology prediction of ABC proteins.

ABC-Finder i.e., A Docker-based package for the identification of ABC proteins in all organisms, and downstream analysis and visualization of the topology of ABC proteins using an interactive web browser.

bioschemas.name: ABC-finder
